faqs.question: What are the services you provide to suppliers?
faqs.answer_html: From fulfillment to market research to retail partnerhips to pricing strategy, we help suppliers sell easily online. Please view more details here.

faqs.question: What type of suppliers do you work with?
faqs.answer_html: We work with international and domestic suppliers, including manufacturers and wholesalers.

faqs.question: What stage supplier do you work with?
faqs.answer_html: We work with start-up brands, enterprise brands, and every size in between.

faqs.question: What are the requirements do you have to work with your company?
faqs.answer_html: We don't have minimums, but we'd like to build a plan for success. Our goal is to ensure you have enough products to sell.

faqs.question: I am a new supplier building sales through e-commerce. Will you help me understand how to price and feature my products?
faqs.answer_html: Absolutely. We want your products to succeed, and our internal team, led by your Vendor Manager, will work with you directly on a sales strategy.

faqs.question: What is the timeline for getting my products live on sales channels?
faqs.answer_html: While your products are on the way from your factory to our warehouse, our internal team will work to get your products ready to sell on sales channels. The timeline varies by retailer.

faqs.question: How can I track my inventory and performance?
faqs.answer_html: You will have access to our proprietary Cenports dashboard, which allows you to track orders, inventory, product performance, invoices, and reports.

faqs.question: What product categories do you have in your catalog?
faqs.answer_html: We introduce unique and high-quality products including furniture, pets, home decor, cooking, and more that can be used to improve every indoor and outdoor space.

faqs.question: What if my products aren't selling?
faqs.answer_html: From time to time, this may occur. We will do our best to work with you and other channels to find the best solutions.

faqs.question: What other services do you offer that can help us in growing our sales in the US market?
faqs.answer_html: We also have helped our suppliers succeed in the US market by offering storage, 3rd-party fulfillment, copywriting, photography, and product design services. We can curate a la carte services that are most needed for your brand.

faqs.question: How do I become a partner with AndMakers?
faqs.answer_html: To start the process of becoming an AndMakers supplier, simply fill out the contact us form and a member of our team will be in touch as soon as possible to walk you through our onboarding process.

faqs.question: How does your sales network work?
faqs.answer_html:
Sales are generated by the connections our AndMakers team makes with retailers. We work with different types of sales partners:
1) Wholesale B2B;
2) marketplace B2C;
3) Direct to Consumer.
Our goal is to work with our vendor partners to develop customized strategies that fit their products and their business goals. We are also excited to share that we will be adding a network of brick-and-mortar retailer partners in the future. Stay tuned or hop on our email subscribers list for the latest news.

faqs.question: What e-commerce retailers are you working with now?
faqs.answer_html: You can find AndMakers products at nearly 100 major U.S. retailers including Wayfair, Walmart, Houzz, Lowe's, and select boutique vendors.

faqs.question: Will you help my brand choose suitable online retailers in the US?
faqs.answer_html: Absolutely! After you're officially onboarded, our team will assign a dedicated Account Manager who will work with you to understand your expansion goals and develop a comprehensive strategy for where and how to list your products.

faqs.question: What is your pricing? Do you have a pricing guide you can share?
faqs.answer_html: Yes, please email us at makers@andmakers.co to learn more.

faqs.question: What is your payment terms? And when do I get paid?
faqs.answer_html: We pay you within 45 days from receiving payments from the retailers.

faqs.question: Where are your fulfillment centers located?
faqs.answer_html: Our warehouses are located in Hayward, California.

faqs.question: What are AndMakers' supported/partner shipping companies?
faqs.answer_html: Orders are shipped via UPS, USPS, FedEx, and DHL for small parcels and ABF, Estes, KKW, YRC, Pilot, and Ceva for LTL freights. We prefer using our own account but we can use your company’s shipping account if you prefer.

faqs.question: Will my goods be safe in your warehouse?
faqs.answer_html: Yes, all of our warehouses are equipped with high-quality security features. We also offer product liability insurance at cost to our partners.

faqs.question: We have our own 3PL warehouse, is it possible to access retail sales channels and sales management services without the fulfillment service?
faqs.answer_html: Yes, our business model is flexible depending on the needs of our clients.

faqs.question: How are replacements/return for damaged items handled?
faqs.answer_html: Retailers have their own return and replacement policies,and we advise our suppliers to provide an allowance for these instances. If you choose to add Customer Service to your package, your company will have a dedicated team to manage customer and retailer queries.

faqs.question: What product categories do you have in your catalog?
faqs.answer_html: We have a collection of thousands of non-food products including furniture, home decor, outdoor products, and pet products. We are always introducing new products made by our network of global artisans.

faqs.question: What are some of the products you are specializing in?
faqs.answer_html: We introduce unique and high-quality products that can be used to improve every indoor and outdoor space.

faqs.question: What e-commerce retailers are you working with now?
faqs.answer_html: You can find AndMakers products at most major U.S. retailers including Wayfair, Walmart, Houzz, Lowe's, and select boutique vendors.

faqs.question: How do I become a retailer partner with AndMakers?
faqs.answer_html: To start the process of becoming an AndMakers retailer, simply fill out your details here and a member of our retail team will be in touch as soon as possible to walk you through our onboarding process.

faqs.question: Will we get real-time inventory data?
faqs.answer_html: Yes, we can provide you with real-time inventory data via EDI, API, FTP, or email.

faqs.question: How do I become a retailer of AndMakers?
faqs.answer_html: To start the process of becoming an AndMakers retailer, simply fill out the contact us form and a member of our team will be in touch as soon as possible to walk you through our onboarding process.

faqs.question: Do your brands have MAP (Minimum Advertised Price)?
faqs.answer_html: Yes, some of our brands have MAP, which we are committed to monitoring and enforcing.

faqs.question: Do you have a dropship fee?
faqs.answer_html: We do not charge dropship fees.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer_html:
We accept the following payment methods:
Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and ACH.

faqs.question: Do you have drop-ship capabilities?
faqs.answer_html: Yes, we can drop-ship directly to customers.

faqs.question: Where are your fulfillment centers located?
faqs.answer_html: Our warehouses are located in Hayward, California.

faqs.question: How quickly can you ship the orders?
faqs.answer_html: We always try to ship orders as quickly as possible. Our commitment is to ship ground orders within 24-48 hours of your order being placed (assuming items are in stock). If it is critical that an order be processed quickly, please email us.

faqs.question: What are AndMakers' supported/partner shipping companies?
faqs.answer_html: Orders are shipped via UPS, USPS, FedEx, and DHL for small parcels and ABF, Estes, KKW, YRC, Pilot, and Ceva for LTL freights. We prefer using our own account but we can use your company’s shipping account if you prefer.

faqs.question: Do you have any lightweight items (less than 8 lbs.) or LTL items (more than 150 lbs.)?
faqs.answer_html: Yes, we have both types.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer_html: Yes, we can. Please inquire by emailing support@cenports.com

faqs.question: Do you support returns? If so, what is your warranty policy?
faqs.answer_html: Yes, we support returns; warranty policies vary for each brand. Your dedicated Account Manager will discuss this with you prior to getting the products live on your website.
